channel.title: Setting Up Environment on CI/CD using AWS CDK Workshop
channel.description: Recent content in Setting Up Environment on CI/CD using AWS CDK Workshop

item.title: 2. Environment Check and Set Up
item.description: Check NPM version To check NPM version execute command below in the terminal. $ npm --version The output should look like this. 6.14.6 Check and Update CDK To check CDK version execute command below in the terminal. cdk --version The output should look like this. 1.70.0 (build c145314) To update the CDK version to latest, execute command below in the terminal. npm i -g -f aws-cdk@latest To initiate the CDK bootstrap asset, execute command below.
